thread.title: Japanese romance is contender for Cannes top prize

title: Japanese romance is contender for Cannes top prize
text:
Japanese romance is contender for Cannes top prize 9:15pm BST - 01:24
''Asako I & II'' (Netemo Sametemo) had its premiere at Cannes Film Festival, the japanese romance film is up for the top prize - the Palme d'Or. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
"Asako I & II" (Netemo Sametemo) had its premiere at Cannes Film Festival, the japanese romance film is up for the top prize - the Palme d'Or.
